name: Original
summary:
"Original" is an action puzzle game that tests operation

O is a robot specially born to explore the secret realm, it is invincible.
You will control O to go to a rare and uninhabited secret realm, control the direction and distance of O during the adventure, travel through the secret realm to find treasures and bring them back to the transmitter.
During the adventure, you will face various ancient organs, difficult terrain, and magical creatures. Use your reaction and wisdom to solve various difficulties along the way!
